trending.name: Mojito
trending.description: A classic Island drink of fresh lime and sweet muddled mint, the Mojito became a favorite during the Prohibition era when rum flights would carry thirsty travellers from Miami to Havana under the cover of night.

suggested.name: Mojito
suggested.description: A classic Island drink of fresh lime and sweet muddled mint, the Mojito became a favorite during the Prohibition era when rum flights would carry thirsty travellers from Miami to Havana under the cover of night.
